sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card height="90vh" class="mt-4 ml-4 mr-2" tile elevation="0">
    <v-list subheader>
      <v-subheader>Recent chat</v-subheader>

      <v-list-item
          v-for="chat in recent"
          :key="chat.title"
      >
        <v-list-item-avatar>
          <v-img
              :alt="`${chat.title} avatar`"
              :src="chat.avatar"
          ></v-img>
        </v-list-item-avatar>

        <v-list-item-content>
          <v-list-item-title v-text="chat.title"></v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item-content>

        <v-list-item-icon>
          <v-icon :color="chat.active ? 'deep-purple accent-4' : 'grey'">
            mdi-message-outline
          </v-icon>
        </v-list-item-icon>
      </v-list-item>
    </v-list>

    <v-divider></v-divider>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "ChatUsers"
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
